name: The Ballad of Lolth
description:
>--The Ballad Of Lolth-->

The spider-less entirely digital TTRPG: 4th edition

WARNING: contains one spider (we're attempting to get rid of it).

WARNING: This is a deception, this isn't a TTRPG. 

Play as a spider attempting to survive a tabletop RPG session.

Avoid fireballs and blades, rocks will fall and this spider will not die!

Pick up an unhealthy number of dice and throw them yourself to be told your own story!

Praise Lolth!
